settings.heading: Frequently ask question
settings.row_content: Shopify is a complete commerce platform that lets you start, grow, and manage a business. Create and customize an online store Sell in multiple places, including web, mobile, social media, online marketplaces, brick-and-mortar locations, and pop-up shops.
